result.arabic_text: وَقَدۡ مَكَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡمَكۡرُ جَمِيعٗاۖ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِبُ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖۗ وَسَيَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡكُفَّٰرُ لِمَنۡ عُقۡبَى ٱلدَّارِ
result.translation: 42. Nummah keenik dumi mari sinni farmoytiitih uma mala malse Nabiyow ama koros uma malah koh kah malissa innah, tokkel Yalli ken makari inkih bayseleeh umaane keenil как gacele, Yalli ummaan nafsi abba haam yaaxigeh, ama koros Qhiyaamah ayro sinni Rabbil xayyowta waqdi ellecabô dabqay meqey fayla le lem kinni mara aaxigelon.
